meanings.sent1: The astringency of the lemon juice made my mouth pucker.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the astringency of the unripe apple as I took a bite.
meanings.sent3: The astringency of the vinegar was so strong that it made my eyes water.
meanings.sent4: The astringency of the situation left us all feeling tense and uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The astringency of the medicine made it hard to swallow.

meanings.definition: The ability to cause contraction of body tissues.
meanings.sent1: The astringency of the cold water helped reduce the swelling in my ankle.
meanings.sent2: The astringency of the ointment helped stop the bleeding from the cut.
meanings.sent3: The astringency of the bandage made my brother laugh as he tried to wrap it around his finger.
meanings.sent4: The astringency of the ice pack numbed the pain in my shoulder.
meanings.sent5: The astringency of the antiseptic stung my skin but helped clean the wound.
